Honeywell Customer Connect
Dear Honeywell Customer:
I’m David Ladd, your Customer Support Manager, and I would like to share with you news and information to help you get the most out of your Honeywell products and services. We value your feedback and are working hard to respond and address it so that we can further improve. Honeywell Customer & Product Support Expands Number of Operators Conferences in 2018 The Honeywell Customer & Product Support Team has exciting news to share. We’re expanding our schedule of operators’ conferences, building upon the tremendous success of these events in 2017. We held 45 conferences and met face-to-face with more than 1,600 customers worldwide last year.
Honeywell Engineer Goes the Distance to Connect with Customers Connecting aircraft passengers to the Internet at 40,000 feet is all in a day’s work for James Lee. A senior product support engineer, Lee is Honeywell’s go-to guy on satellite communications systems for just about anything that flies.
Honeywell's Team of Field Service Engineers Supported the First PC-24 Launch Customer The on-site support provided to PlaneSense for its first PC-24 aircraft delivery ensured a flawless entry into service experience
